mapper.insert: insert into recruit(rnum, pid, title, contents, end_date, makeday, changeday, makeid, changeid) values(#{rnum}, #{pid}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{end_date}, #{makeday}, #{changeday}, #{makeid}, #{changeid})
mapper.update: update recruit set pid=#{pid}, title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, end_date=#{end_date}, makeday=#{makeday}, changeday=#{changeday}, makeid=#{makeid}, changeid=#{changeid} where rnum=#{rnum}
